nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to design APIs that prioritize strict data privacy while keeping them simple to develop and maintain efficiently.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to API design and implementation that ensure strict data privacy while maintaining simplicity and ease of development.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to create secure APIs that protect patient privacy while enabling efficient and scalable healthcare application development.
cluster_name: Secure APIs for Clinical Data Access
cluster_description: Functional stories concerning the development and use of secure APIs that safeguard patient privacy and support scalable healthcare applications.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to ensure ALFRED features maintain performance on older devices used by medical staff, balancing modern tools with system compatibility.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to system features and applications that must perform effectively on older hardware and devices used by medical professionals.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to ensure patient data privacy and secure storage to fully respect patient autonomy and completely prevent unauthorized access.
cluster_description: Functional stories dealing with data storage, access control, and privacy mechanisms that guarantee patient autonomy and prevent unauthorized data access.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to design APIs that prioritize strict patient data privacy according to user preferences, even if it limits clinical access, to fully respect patient autonomy.
cluster_name: Balance patient autonomy with clinical access
cluster_description: Functional stories related to API behaviors and data sharing controls that respect user privacy preferences, potentially restricting clinical data access to uphold autonomy.

nfus_summary: As a full-stack developer, I want clear and comprehensive API documentation so I can efficiently build accessible, secure healthcare apps that align with my development practices and respect user privacy.
cluster_description: Functional stories involving the creation, maintenance, and use of thorough API documentation that supports secure, accessible app development aligned with privacy standards.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want app installations to require explicit user consent so users maintain full control and trust in the system.
cluster_name: Require Explicit User Permission for App Installations
cluster_description: Functional stories about app installation workflows that enforce explicit user consent to uphold user control and trust.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to enforce strict data controls and provide formal communication options to fully respect users' privacy concerns.
cluster_name: Stricter Data Controls and Formal Communication
cluster_description: Functional stories that implement rigorous data control policies and enable formal communication channels to address user privacy requirements.

nfus_summary: As a developer, I want to ensure my apps install and activate only with explicit user consent to fully respect older adults' privacy preferences.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to app lifecycle management that strictly require explicit user consent for installation and activation, respecting privacy preferences.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to interact with ALFRED using a friendly, informal conversational style to feel comfortable and motivated in my daily activities.
cluster_description: Functional stories involving user interaction and communication styles that provide friendly, informal conversational experiences for comfort and motivation.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to wear small, simple, and comfortable health sensors to continuously track my progress and stay motivated to challenge myself with harder exercises.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to the use and integration of wearable health sensors that are small, simple, and comfortable for continuous progress tracking and motivation.

nfus_summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to wear small, simple, and comfortable health wearables so I can stay motivated to challenge myself with harder exercises.
cluster_description: Functional stories addressing wearable device design, usability, and user experience to ensure comfort and motivation during health or exercise activities.

nfus_summary: As an older person eager to wear health wearables, I want a small, simple, and comfortable device that does not interfere with my daily life.
cluster_description: Functional stories concerning the design and functionality of wearable devices that prioritize minimal interference, simplicity, and comfort for daily use.

nfus_summary: As an older adult with mild mobility issues, I want the wearable sensor to be small, simple, and comfortable so I can wear it constantly without losing motivation or feeling stigmatized.
cluster_description: Functional stories focused on wearable sensor design and operation that ensure unobtrusiveness, comfort, and user motivation without stigma.

nfus_summary: As a medical staff member, I want ALFRED to use a strictly formal and clinical communication style with patients to maintain clear professional boundaries and focus on health data.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to system communication styles that enforce formal, clinical language and professional boundaries with patients.

nfus_summary: As an older person who is cautious with technology, I want to activate ALFRED only when I deliberately use push-to-talk commands to ensure I feel in control and avoid unexpected interactions.
cluster_description: Functional stories that implement explicit user-initiated activation mechanisms, such as push-to-talk, to provide user control and prevent unintended system interactions.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block all sharing of my health data to maintain full privacy and prevent any access by family, caregivers, doctors, or third parties.
cluster_name: Strict Control Over Health Data Sharing
cluster_description: Functional stories governing data sharing policies and controls that completely block health data sharing to ensure full user privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block sharing of all my sensor data with anyone, including caregivers and third parties, to fully protect my privacy.
cluster_name: Block Sharing of Selected Sensor Data
cluster_description: Functional stories managing sensor data access and sharing restrictions to fully protect user privacy by blocking all sensor data sharing.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block all data sharing entirely to protect my privacy and feel secure using the system.
cluster_description: Functional stories related to comprehensive data sharing restrictions that prevent any data dissemination to maintain user security and privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older person who values formality, I want ALFRED to communicate only in formal and polite language to ensure respect and comfort.
cluster_description: Functional stories that enforce system communication in formal and polite language to respect user preferences and maintain comfort.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to hardly wear health monitoring wearables and ensure no data is shared with third parties to protect my privacy.
cluster_name: Avoid Regular Use of Health Wearables Due to Privacy
cluster_description: Functional stories that support minimal or optional use of health wearables and enforce strict data sharing restrictions to protect privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to avoid video check-ins arranged by caregivers and prefer offline communication to protect my privacy and feel safe.
cluster_name: Prefer Offline Communication over Video Check-ins
cluster_description: Functional stories that enable alternative offline communication methods, avoiding video check-ins to respect user privacy and safety preferences.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to use ALFRED only when I explicitly activate it with push-to-talk to keep full control and avoid feeling overwhelmed or intruded upon.
cluster_name: Use ALFRED as a strictly functional tool
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing user-controlled, explicit activation and minimizing unsolicited system interactions to preserve user autonomy.

nfus_summary: As an older person I want ALFRED to keep its use simple and block all data sharing to ensure I do not feel overwhelmed or unsafe about my privacy.
cluster_name: Avoid Technology Overwhelm and Data Risks
cluster_description: Functional stories focusing on simplifying system use, reducing data sharing, and minimizing user burden to prevent overwhelm and privacy concerns.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block all app installations and dismiss almost all notifications to avoid feeling overwhelmed and protect my privacy.
cluster_name: Minimize Interruptions and Block Intrusive Apps
cluster_description: Functional stories controlling app installation and notification delivery to minimize user interruptions and avoid privacy intrusions.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to send almost no notifications or check-ins and only provide minimal support to respect my privacy and avoid overwhelming me.
cluster_name: Respect My Independence with Minimal Support
cluster_description: Functional stories that limit notifications and system-initiated interactions to provide minimal, non-intrusive support respecting user independence.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to send almost no reminders or prompts, so I can avoid feeling pressured or overwhelmed.
cluster_description: Functional stories that restrict reminders, prompts, and nudges to preserve user autonomy and prevent pressure or overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I explicitly push-to-talk, avoiding almost all unsolicited messages to maintain full control and minimize overwhelming interactions.
cluster_description: Functional stories that enforce push-to-talk activation and block unsolicited messages to maintain user control and minimize overwhelming interactions.

nfus_summary: As an older person I want all communications through ALFRED to be formal, polite, and strictly distant to preserve my privacy and control.
cluster_name: Enforce Formal and Distant Social Tone
cluster_description: Functional stories managing communication tone and style to ensure formality, politeness, and social distance preserving user privacy and control.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I push-to-talk and to block almost all notifications and messages so I can keep control and avoid feeling overwhelmed or intruded upon.
cluster_description: Functional stories controlling notification delivery and interaction modes to ensure responses occur only on explicit user initiation, minimizing overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I push-to-talk and avoid explanations, so I can use it without feeling overwhelmed or confused.
cluster_description: Functional stories focusing on simple, clear user interactions triggered by explicit commands, avoiding unsolicited explanations to reduce confusion.

nfus_summary: As an older person I want all my communications through ALFRED to be formal, polite, and ethical, avoiding any social warmth or casual talk that makes me uncomfortable.
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing strictly formal, polite, and ethical communication styles avoiding casual or warm social interactions.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to only respond when I push-to-talk and use strictly formal, polite language in all interactions to protect my privacy and make me feel safe and respected.
cluster_name: Monitor System Compliance with Privacy and Formality
cluster_description: Functional stories that ensure system responses are triggered solely by push-to-talk and maintain formal, polite communication for privacy and safety.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to stay nearly invisible and only respond when I choose, so I can keep control and avoid feeling monitored or overwhelmed.
cluster_description: Functional stories that minimize system visibility and unsolicited interactions, activating only on explicit user requests to maintain control.

nfus_summary: As an older person I want to completely block system monitoring of my recovery to protect my privacy and avoid feeling controlled.
cluster_description: Functional stories that prevent system monitoring or data collection related to recovery progress to protect user privacy and autonomy.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to activate only when I explicitly ask and to never share my data or send almost any notifications, to preserve my privacy and control.
cluster_description: Functional stories ensuring system activation only on explicit user request, blocking data sharing and minimizing notifications to preserve privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block all data sharing and reject almost all notifications so I can keep my privacy and avoid feeling overwhelmed by technology.
cluster_name: Strict Privacy Control with Minimal Interaction
cluster_description: Functional stories that enforce blocking of data sharing and minimize notifications to maintain strict user privacy and reduce technology overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block all data sharing and receive only formal, polite messages to protect my privacy and feel secure using ALFRED.
cluster_name: Strict Privacy Control and Formal Interaction
cluster_description: Functional stories that combine data sharing restrictions with formal and polite communication to protect privacy and enhance user security.

nfus_summary: As an older person I want to wear ALFRED devices only reluctantly and with no data sharing allowed to fully protect my privacy and feel safe.
cluster_name: Wear Wearable with Strict Privacy Control
cluster_description: Functional stories that support optional wearable device use with strict data sharing prohibitions to protect user privacy and security.

nfus_summary: As an older person I want my wearable to collect data silently without interaction, never share my data, and avoid any prompts that make me feel overwhelmed.
cluster_description: Functional stories enabling passive data collection by wearables without user interaction or data sharing, minimizing user burden and privacy risks.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to avoid all challenging exercises that feel taxing or embarrassing, so I can maintain my comfort and control during recovery.
cluster_name: Reject Overly Taxing or Embarrassing Exercises
cluster_description: Functional stories that design exercise programs and activities to avoid taxing or embarrassing challenges, preserving user comfort and control.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to receive only ALFRED messages and notifications I explicitly request and all communication to be formal and polite to protect my privacy and avoid feeling overwhelmed.
cluster_name: Minimal and Formal Interaction with ALFRED
cluster_description: Functional stories that restrict ALFRED messaging to explicit user requests and enforce formal, polite communication to protect privacy and reduce overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to support my recovery only when I ask, without unsolicited messages or interventions, so I can keep full control and avoid feeling overwhelmed.
cluster_name: Support Recovery Only on My Terms
cluster_description: Functional stories that provide recovery support exclusively upon user request, avoiding unsolicited interventions to maintain user control.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to respond only when I use push-to-talk and to block almost all notifications, so I can protect my privacy and avoid feeling overwhelmed.
cluster_description: Functional stories enforcing user-initiated push-to-talk interactions while blocking unsolicited notifications to ensure privacy and reduce overwhelm.

nfus_summary: As an older adult I want to block all app installations and notifications unless I specifically request them, to avoid digital intrusions and protect my privacy.
cluster_description: Functional stories that control app installation and notification delivery, blocking all unsolicited events to prevent digital intrusion and protect privacy.

nfus_summary: As an older person, I want to block almost all ALFRED notifications and prevent any data sharing with family, caregivers, doctors, or third parties to protect my privacy and feel secure.
cluster_name: Control System Boundaries and Privacy Strictly
cluster_description: Functional stories that implement strict controls on notifications and data sharing to safeguard privacy boundaries and user security.

nfus_summary: As an informal caregiver managing multiple clients, I want to control ALFRED's technology use to prioritize each client's privacy and autonomy, ensuring their independence without discomfort or mistrust.
cluster_description: Functional stories that provide caregivers control over ALFRED's technology use, prioritizing client privacy and autonomy while maintaining trust and independence.
